but , i feel lost and far away from who i truly am.

content.text: Hi, how are you doing today?
I'm doing okay! Not great, but okay.
Oh, I'm sorry to hear that. What's wrong?
I'm just feeling a bit lost and directionless. I feel like I'm not sure who I am or what I want to do with my life.
I can relate to that. I went through a similar phase a few years ago. It's hard to feel like you're not sure where you're going.
Yeah, it really is. I'm just not sure how to get through it.
Well, for me, I found it helpful to talk to my friends and family about how I was feeling. They were able to offer me support and guidance.
I've tried talking to my friends and family, but they don't seem to understand.
I'm sorry to hear that. Maybe you could try talking to a therapist? They can help you to work through your feelings and find a path forward.
I've thought about it, but I'm not sure if I can afford it.
There are some therapists who offer sliding scale rates, so you might be able to find one that you can afford.
I'll look into it. Thanks for your help.
You're welcome. I hope you're able to find a path forward.
